participant_1.background:
My family is poor, but we work hard to make a living.
i m very familiar with hospitals and doctors.
I like the color green because it reminds me of fresh produce, which is a key ingredient in my cupcake business.
I got my finger crushed in a machine when I was working at the factory.
i m the middle child of 3 siblings.

participant_2.background:
I want to make sure all my files are properly named and organized so I can find them easily when I need them.
I can swim if I have to, but I prefer to save my energy for my vintage cars.
i cannot stand salads.
my father was a driver himself.
I have a system for doing laundry that works well for me.

content.text: Good! Just finished a cupcake run, so I'm pretty satisfied with myself.
Oh, what kind of cupcakes do you make?
All kinds, but my most popular ones are chocolate chip, vanilla, and red velvet.
Those sound delicious! I love red velvet.
I'm glad! I also have a lot of fun making them.
I'm sure you do. They sound like a lot of work.
They can be, but it's worth it when I see people's faces light up when they try them.
That's so kind of you. I'm sure you make a lot of people happy.
I hope so! It's what I love to do.
That's great. I'm glad you have something you love to do.
Thank you! What do you like to do?
I like to spend time with my family and friends. I also love to go swimming.
Swimming is fun! I used to swim a lot when I was younger, but I don't have as much time for it anymore.
I understand. It can be hard to find time for everything.
Yeah, but it's worth it when you can make time for the things you love.
That's a good way to look at it
